text: Mandeep Antil (born 10 November 1989) is an Indian field hockey player who plays as a forward. He was the captain of the national team that won the silver medal at the 2016 South Asian Games. ==References== ==External links== *Player profile at Hockey India Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sonipat district Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:Field hockey players from Haryana Category:South Asian Games silver medalists for India Category:South Asian Games medalists in field hockey
title: Mandeep Antil
